TITLE: AI Text Transformation
DEF: Transforming text according to a schema
TASK: The AI Text Transformation pattern involves restructuring, reformatting, or translating text with the help of AI. Uses cases include  the reformatting of structured text, transforming a complex text into a narrative system of connected elements, or translating languages. We include speech-to-text applications in this pattern. Transforming text allows for efficient adaptation of content to different formats or audiences, and can provide new perspectives on the material. Risks arise from misunderstanding the text, oversimplification, or from introducing errors during transformation, especially in speech transcription and language translation. To ensure success, provide clear parameters for the transformation process, provide examples, and thoroughly review the results.
